Name: Perceptions of the Dead
About the game: The first thing you need to know is that ghosts are real. The rest, you can only learn on your own. Follow three stories set in a world where the dead linger, and things far worse wait beyond the veil. The Phantom Ice Cream Truck Follow a denizen of the border between life and dead as he answers the call to rescue a missing child. Perceptions of the Dead Tyrone has made it his business to help solve the troubles of those afflicted by the undead, but what seems like a case of a benign haunting may find him risking more than his life, but his very soul. Live with Jill Count Jill has had moderate success as a streamer, and to mix things up, this Halloween she is going to life-stream a visit to a haunted hospital. The twist? It's actually haunted.
